Sensex falls 400 points, Nifty slips below 23,500 as tariff jitters hit Dalal StreetThe S&P BSE Sensex was down 253.38 points to 77,161.54, while the NSE Nifty50 fell 46.80 points to 23,472.55 as of 9:31 am.

Retiring Tilak Varma was a mistake: Mumbai Indians slammed after Lucknow lossIPL 2025, LSG vs MI: Former cricketers Sunil Gavaskar and Harbhajan Singh questioned Mumbai Indians' decision to retire out Tilak Varma in their failed chase of 204 in Lucknow. Watch: DC co-owner Parth Jindal takes Delhi metro route to attend KKR clashDC co-owner Parth Jindal took the Delhi Metro to reach the Arun Jaitley Stadium, showcasing his down-to-earth spirit and commitment ahead of his team's crucial IPL 2025 clash against Kolkata Knight Riders.

Watch: DC mentor Kevin Pietersen at his teaching best for Abhishek PorelIPL 2025: Kevin Pietersen's mentorship of Abhishek Porel reflects his serious commitment to Delhi Capitals, offering the young batter valuable guidance ahead of a crucial clash against Kolkata Knight Riders.
